00058 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00059 |                                    Init                                      |
00060 +------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00061 | Description:                                                                                                                             |
00062 |    Initialises the window, sets up the OpenGL Rendering Context and the like.|
00063 |    Fill static variables of the class before using thie method!                          |
00064 | Arguments:                                                                                                                               |
00065 |  - WORD hIcon - ID of the Window icon   (optional)                                           |
00066 |  - WORD hMenu - ID of the Menu Resource (optional)                                           |
00067 | Return value:                                                                                                                            |
00068 |    true if everything goes ok, unless false                                                              |
00069 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00070 bool CGLApp::Init(WORD hMenu, bool (*procCommand)(WORD, HMENU), WORD hIcon) {
00071         WNDCLASS wc;
00072         DWORD wStyle, wStyleEx;
00073         RECT rectWin;
00074 
00075         m_hInstance = GetModuleHandle(NULL);
00076 
00077         // fill wc structure:
00078         wc.style = CS_HREDRAW | CS_VREDRAW | CS_OWNDC;
00079         wc.lpfnWndProc = (WNDPROC)WindowProc;
00080         wc.cbClsExtra = 0;
00081         wc.cbWndExtra = 0;
00082         wc.hInstance = m_hInstance;
00083         wc.hbrBackground = NULL;
00084         wc.hCursor = LoadCursor(NULL, IDC_ARROW);
00085         wc.hIcon = LoadIcon(NULL, MAKEINTRESOURCE(hIcon));
00086         wc.lpszMenuName = MAKEINTRESOURCE(hMenu);
00087         wc.lpszClassName = WND_CLASS_NAME;
00088 
00089         // register class:
00090         if (RegisterClass(&wc) == 0) {
00091                 return false;
00092         }
00093 
00094         // Set full screen mode?
00095         if (m_bFullscreen == true) {
00096                 DEVMODE dm;
00097                 ZeroMemory(&dm, sizeof(dm));
00098                 dm.dmSize = sizeof(dm);
00099                 dm.dmBitsPerPel = m_iBpp;
00100                 dm.dmPelsWidth = m_iWidth;
00101                 dm.dmPelsHeight = m_iHeight;
00102                 dm.dmFields = DM_BITSPERPEL | DM_PELSWIDTH | DM_PELSWIDTH;
00103 
00104                 if (ChangeDisplaySettings(&dm, CDS_FULLSCREEN) != DISP_CHANGE_SUCCESSFUL) {
00105                         return false;
00106                 }
00107 
00108                 // special styles of window:
00109                 wStyle = WS_POPUP;
00110                 wStyleEx = WS_EX_APPWINDOW;
00111                 ShowCursor(FALSE);
00112         }
00113         else {
00114                 wStyle = WS_POPUPWINDOW | WS_CAPTION | WS_MINIMIZEBOX;
00115                 wStyleEx = WS_EX_APPWINDOW | WS_EX_WINDOWEDGE;
00116         }
00117 
00118         // window width and heigth:
00119         rectWin.left = 0;
00120         rectWin.right = m_iWidth;
00121         rectWin.top = 0;
00122         rectWin.bottom = m_iHeight;
00123 
00124         // client area in windowed mode will be gla_win.w and gla_win.h
00125         AdjustWindowRectEx(&rectWin, wStyle, (hMenu != NULL ? TRUE : FALSE), wStyleEx);
00126 
00127         // create window:
00128         m_hWnd = CreateWindowEx(wStyleEx, WND_CLASS_NAME, m_szTitle, wStyle,
00129                                                                  0, 0, rectWin.right - rectWin.left, rectWin.bottom - rectWin.top,
00130                                                                  NULL, NULL, m_hInstance, NULL);
00131         
00132         if (m_hWnd == NULL) {
00133                 return false;
00134         }
00135 
00136         // get DC
00137         m_hDC= GetDC(m_hWnd);
00138         if (m_hDC == NULL) {
00139                 return FALSE;
00140         }
00141 
00142         // set pixel format:
00143         int pf;
00144 
00145         static  PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR pfd =
00146         {
00147                 sizeof(PIXELFORMATDESCRIPTOR),
00148                 1,                                                                                      // Version Number
00149                 PFD_DRAW_TO_WINDOW |                                            // Format Must Support Window
00150                 PFD_SUPPORT_OPENGL |                                            // Format Must Support OpenGL
00151                 PFD_DOUBLEBUFFER,                                                       // Must Support Double Buffering
00152                 PFD_TYPE_RGBA,                                                          // Request An RGBA Format
00153                 m_iBpp,                                                                         // Select Our Color Depth
00154                 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,                                                       // Color Bits Ignored
00155                 0,                                                                                      // No Alpha Buffer
00156                 0,                                                                                      // Shift Bit Ignored
00157                 0,                                                                                      // No Accumulation Buffer
00158                 0, 0, 0, 0,                                                                     // Accumulation Bits Ignored
00159                 16,                                                                                     // 16Bit Z-Buffer (Depth Buffer)  
00160                 1,                                                                                      // Stencil Buffer
00161                 0,                                                                                      // No Auxiliary Buffer
00162                 PFD_MAIN_PLANE,                                                         // Main Drawing Layer
00163                 0,                                                                                      // Reserved
00164                 0, 0, 0                                                                         // Layer Masks Ignored
00165         };
00166 
00167         pf = ChoosePixelFormat(m_hDC, &pfd);
00168 
00169         if (pf == 0)
00170                 return false;
00171 
00172         if (SetPixelFormat(m_hDC, pf, &pfd) == FALSE)
00173                 return false;
00174 
00175         // Rendering context:
00176         m_hRC = wglCreateContext(m_hDC);
00177         if (m_hRC == NULL)
00178                 return false;
00179 
00180         if (wglMakeCurrent(m_hDC, m_hRC) == FALSE)
00181                 return false;
00182 
00183         // Show Window and set to be foreground:
00184         ShowWindow(m_hWnd,SW_SHOW);
00185         SetForegroundWindow(m_hWnd);
00186         SetFocus(m_hWnd);
00187 
00188         m_hMenu = GetMenu(m_hWnd);
00189 
00190     // set callback function for the WM_COMMAND event:
00191         m_procCommand = procCommand;
00192 
00193         // success! :)
00194         return true;
00195 }
00196 
00197 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00198 |                                  Destroy                                     |
00199 +------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00200 | Description:                                                                                                                             |
00201 |    Cleans up and closes the window                                                   |
00202 | Arguments:                                                                                                                               |
00203 |                                                                                                                                                  |
00204 | Return value:                                                                                                                            |
00205 |    true if everything goes ok, unless false                                                              |
00206 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00207 bool CGLApp::Destroy() {
00208         if (m_bFullscreen == true) {
00209                 // back to desktop:
00210                 ChangeDisplaySettings(NULL, 0);
00211                 ShowCursor(TRUE);
00212         }
00213 
00214         // Rendering Context:
00215         if (m_hRC != NULL) {
00216                 wglMakeCurrent(m_hDC, NULL);
00217                 wglDeleteContext(m_hRC);
00218                 m_hRC = NULL;
00219         }
00220 
00221         // Device Context:
00222         if (m_hDC != NULL) { 
00223                 DeleteDC(m_hDC);
00224                 m_hDC = NULL;
00225         }
00226 
00227         // Window:
00228         if (m_hWnd!= NULL) {
00229                 DestroyWindow(m_hWnd);
00230                 m_hWnd = NULL;
00231         }
00232 
00233         // Class:
00234         UnregisterClass(WND_CLASS_NAME, m_hInstance);
00235 
00236         return true;
00237 }
00238 
00239 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00240 |                                 WindowProc                                   |
00241 +------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00242 | Description:                                                                                                                             |
00243 |    Window Procedure for the application - handles WinApi messages.           |
00244 | Arguments:                                                                                                                               |
00245 |  - hWnd - handle to the window                                                                                           |
00246 |  - uiMsg - system message                                                                                                        |
00247 |  - wParam, lParam - special parameters, they depend on the message               |
00248 | Return value:                                                                                                                            |
00249 |    0 - message was served, if sth else the system must serve it...           |
00250 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00251 LRESULT CALLBACK CGLApp::WindowProc(HWND hWnd, UINT uiMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam) {
00252         //PAINTSTRUCT ps; 
00253     //HDC hdc; 
00254         
00255         switch( uiMsg ) {
00256                 case WM_CREATE: {
00257                             
00258                             return 0;
00259                     }
00260                 case WM_ACTIVATE: {
00261                                 if(!HIWORD(wParam))
00262                                         m_bActive = true;
00263                                 else
00264                                         m_bActive = false;
00265                                 return 0;
00266                                 //break;
00267                         }
00268                 case WM_SYSCOMMAND: {
00269                                 switch( wParam ) {
00270                                         case SC_SCREENSAVE:
00271                                         case SC_MONITORPOWER:
00272                                         return 0;
00273                                 }
00274                                 break;
00275                         }
00276                 case WM_COMMAND: {
00277                                 m_menuCommand = LOWORD(wParam);
00278                                 if (m_procCommand != NULL) {
00279                                         if (m_procCommand(m_menuCommand, m_hMenu) == false)
00280                                                 PostQuitMessage(0);
00281                                 }
00282                                 return 0;
00283                         }
00284                 case WM_KEYDOWN: {
00285                                 m_bKeys[wParam]= true;
00286                                 return 0;
00287                                 break;
00288                         }
00289                 case WM_KEYUP: {
00290                                 m_bKeys[wParam]= false;
00291                                 return 0;
00292                                 break;
00293                         }
00294                 case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
00295                 case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
00296                 case WM_LBUTTONUP: 
00297                 case WM_RBUTTONDOWN:
00298                 case WM_RBUTTONUP:   {
00299                                 //get the current mouse position
00300                                 m_iMouseX = (int)LOWORD(lParam);
00301                                 m_iMouseY = (int)HIWORD(lParam);
00302 
00303                                 //get the current mouse button being pressed
00304                                 m_iMouseBtn = (int)wParam;
00305 
00306                                 break;
00307                         }
00308                 case WM_SIZE: {
00309                                 m_iWidth  = LOWORD(lParam);
00310                                 m_iHeight = HIWORD(lParam);
00311 
00312                                 m_bChangeSize = true;
00313                                 return 0;
00314                                 break;
00315                         }
00316                 /*case WM_MOVING: {
00317                                 g_Timer.Freeze();
00318                                 return TRUE;
00319                                 break;
00320                         }
00321                 case WM_MOVE: {
00322                             g_Timer.Unfreeze();
00323                             return 0;
00324                             break;
00325                         }*/
00326                 /*case WM_PAINT: { 
00327                 hdc = BeginPaint(hWnd, &ps); 
00328                 //TextOut(hdc, 0, 0, "Hello, Windows!", 15); 
00329                 m_procRender();
00330                                 EndPaint(hWnd, &ps); 
00331                 return 0;
00332                         }*/
00333             case WM_CLOSE: {
00334                                 PostQuitMessage(0);
00335                                 return 0;
00336                                 break;
00337                         }
00338         }
00339 
00340         return DefWindowProc(hWnd, uiMsg, wParam, lParam);
00341 }
00342 
00343 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00344 |                             CheckWindowMessages                              |
00345 +------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
00346 | Description:                                                                 |
00347 |     Checks if there is any message for the main window of the                |
00348 |     Application and send the message to the window procedure.                |
00349 | Return Value:                                                                |
00350 |     - 0 if there were a WM_QUIT Message                                      |
00351 |     - 1 if there were any message for the window                             |
00352 |     - -1 if there weren't any messages                                       |
00353 +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00354 int CGLApp::CheckWindowMessages() {
00355         static MSG msg;
00356         if (PeekMessage(&msg, NULL, 0, 0, PM_REMOVE)) {          // Is There A Message Waiting?
00357                         if (msg.message == WM_QUIT)     return 0;        // Have We Received A Quit Message?
00358                         else {
00359                                 TranslateMessage(&msg);
00360                                 DispatchMessage(&msg);                          
00361                         }
00362                         return 1;
00363                 }
00364         return -1;
00365 }
